channel.title: A Few Question's. (Help)
channel.description:
Hey,
I'm running a 667-704 server and iv'e been searching on here on how to make a shop now i know you guys might say that there are a lot of tutorial's and i did follow a lot of them related to my revision but when i create the shop and i click on the npc controlling the shop the shop just won't open... can anyone help? or tell me what i'm doing wrong.
Another thing is can anyone give me a code for a donator zone for this revision (667-704) thanks guys that's all for now sorry if this is a noobie question but i'm pretty new to coding at the moment but i know some stuff (Making myself owner, welcome message, starter kits, coding teleports etc....) and if it's not to hard to ask how could i get just one altar that give's the option to change through all spellbook's and all prayer spell books. Thanks peace guys!

item.title: A Few Question's. (Help)
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

Theres an error in your unpackedshops.txt, you might have double spaces or the order is wrong.

Read full topic

item.title: A Few Question's. (Help)
